V2_Path.description: Handler path. Auto-generated with some secret value.

AppName.description: App Name filled in at the top (or even full domain if there is a custom one) to generate the configuration and QR code. If you don’t want to generate it, enter no

QR_Path.description: QR code and configuration link path, the default qr_img, you can also use uuid for confidentiality, but it cannot be the same as V2_Path. If the AppName variable is no, this variable has no effect
